name: Dad
text: It's finally time. Today is your big day.

name: Dad
text: The priest is already waiting for you, you'll find him at the church.

name: Dad
text: Go get your ceremonial markings there. He will instruct you further.

name: You
text: I'll get right to it, Dad!

name: Dad
text: And be careful, we wouldn't want a single scratch on you!
